title: When shall URF be released on 4/22 ?

replies.body: All the other game modes so far were released for me around 3:00 pm Eastern Time.

> [{quoted}](name=Mechanized Hulk,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Wthj7fJv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-22T01:59:15.490+0000)
>
> All the other game modes so far were released for me around 3:00 pm Eastern Time.

What Eastern Time? American or European Eastern Time?
Confirmed to be on live servers at 3PM EST today.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
They said 11AM AEST  - which is 9pm NA time, but they might release it early - you never know with riot
It's now live on OCE servers as of like 11 a.m. local time, so it's really anyone's guess...I'm still gonna hope it's live before I wake up
